scripts.test-travis: npm run test-coveralls && npm run test-cli
scripts.test: npm run test-api && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint-api: eslint --env browser index.js lib/parse.js lib/stringify.js lib/defaults.js lib/utilities.js lib/expressions.js
scripts.lint-test: eslint --env mocha test/index.js test/fixtures.js test/badges.js test/mentions.js
scripts.lint-style: jscs --reporter inline index.js benchmark.js example.js script/build-options.js script/regenerate-fixtures.js lib/cli/*.js lib/parse.js lib/defaults.js lib/stringify.js lib/utilities.js test/*.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.build-man: marked-man doc/mdast.1.md > man/mdast.1 && marked-man doc/mdast.3.md > man/mdast.3 && marked-man doc/mdastrc.5.md > man/mdastrc.5 && marked-man doc/mdastignore.5.md > man/mdastignore.5 && marked-man doc/mdastconfig.7.md > man/mdastconfig.7
scripts.build: npm run build-expressions && npm run build-md && npm run build-options && npm run build-man && npm run build-bundle
